Sentencas: In this work, the trigeneration system, consisting of a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC-H+) and a single-stage LiBr absorption chiller, was proposed.
Titulo: Performance analysis and optimization of a trigeneration process consisting of a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell and a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: The SOFC-H+ and single-stage LiBr absorption chiller models were developed through Aspen Plus V10.
Titulo: Performance analysis and optimization of a trigeneration process consisting of a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell and a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: From the sensitivity analysis, the results show that increases in temperature and fuel utilization can improve the performance of the SOFC-H+.
Titulo: Performance analysis and optimization of a trigeneration process consisting of a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell and a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: Conversely, the air to fuel (A/F) molar ratio and pressure negatively affect the electrical efficiency and overall system efficiency.
Titulo: Performance analysis and optimization of a trigeneration process consisting of a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell and a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: In the case of the absorption chiller, the coefficient of performance was increased and made stable according to a constant value when the generator temperature was increased from 90 to 100 degrees C. When the optimization was performed, it was found that the SOFC-H+ should be operated at 700 degrees C and 10 bar with fuel utilization of 0.8 and A/F molar ratio of 2 to achieve a maximum overall efficiency of 93.34%.
Titulo: Performance analysis and optimization of a trigeneration process consisting of a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell and a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: For the energy and exergy analysis, a combined heat and power SOFC-H+ was found to have the highest energy and exergy efficiencies, followed by the trigeneration process.
Titulo: Performance analysis and optimization of a trigeneration process consisting of a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell and a LiBr absorption chiller

Sentencas: This indicates that the integration of the SOFC-H+ and LiBr absorption chiller is possible to efficiently produce electricity, heating and cooling.(c) 2022 Hydrogen Energy Publications LLC.
Titulo: Performance analysis and optimization of a trigeneration process consisting of a proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cell and a LiBr absorption chiller
